::DarkMouse::

She heard a bot cry out, "Starscream, Now!"  She jumped and ran for 
it.  She knew she had smelled their scent earlier, but now they were 
attacking.  She followed her first mouse insticts, and that was to 
run.  And run she did.  In mouse mode, she scurried off into the 
forest as fast as she could. "Of all the rotten luck." She scurried 
and was about 50 yards away.  She turned her head back to see if any 
of them were following her.  She was still looking behind her and 
didn't see the low lying branch of a tree.  She ran square into it, 
head first.  She fell to the ground, knocked unconsious. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He followed, and continued to shoot at the retreating bots. He
> eventually arrived at there base, guns blazing.
> "Even at your oen turf, you cant defeat the Alliance!"
> 
> ::War Machine::
> 
> He stared at the other gestalt known as Mobster.
> In a efort to keep hitting Mobster, and not give him a chance to hit
> back, War Machine sends a strong right hook, streight for Mobster's 
jaw.
> "You were a fool, to fight me!"
> 
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "DrillBit, terroize!" He wispered, transforming. He took careful 
aim at
> Inferno's head, and fired.
> "StarScream, NOW!"
